channel.title: Vinicius Tsugi | Data & Analytics Leader
channel.description: Recent content on Vinicius Tsugi | Data & Analytics Leader

item.title: About
item.description:
ðŸ‘‹ Hi, I’m Vinicius Tsugi!

Principal Analyst at SEEK

I am a data-driven professional with over 15 years of experience in Digital Analytics and Cloud Analytics platforms. My passion is to develop and nurture a data-driven culture for strategic digital business decisions. I have a hybrid profile with a combination of technical, analytical, and business skills that allows me to bridge the gap between data and decision-making.

Professional Experience

I currently work as a Principal Analyst at SEEK where I apply my expertise in Product Management, Monetization, and Data Analytics to drive business outcomes. Previously, I was a Senior Data & AI Brand Technical Specialist at IBM, providing technical expertise to enterprise customers on Data & AI solutions.

item.title: Projects
item.description:
ðŸš€ Professional Projects & Speaking Engagements

ðŸ“Š Moon Platform Prototype

A collaborative project focused on addressing mobile phone addiction. The Moon Platform helps parents and educators understand the cognitive impacts of mobile applications on children’s health, analyzing and rating popular mobile apps based on their impact on attention, memory, social skills, and more.

ðŸ“ˆ Google Cloud + Marketing Analytics Project

Led one of the biggest Google Cloud + Marketing analytics projects in APAC, utilizing data engineering and machine learning to optimize digital performance programmatically at scale.
